channel.title: How to see Tor circuit
channel.description: When using TBB I like to switch circuits if I get multiple nodes in same country, noticed you removed it on Whonix version of TB. Saw your wiki article that said you removed it for security reasons. I want to see my circuit, how can I access it? Is it on the Gateway?

item.title: How to see Tor circuit
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Can use:

Whonix

Tor Controller

Using a Tor Controller with Whonix ™. Nyx. Vidalia. Change your Tor circuit. Monitor Tor and inspect logs.

But it’s not the same level of detail.

Read full topic

item.title: How to see Tor circuit
item.dc:creator: HiddenDev
item.description:
When using TBB I like to switch circuits if I get multiple nodes in same country, noticed you removed it on Whonix version of TB. Saw your wiki article that said you removed it for security reasons. I want to see my circuit, how can I access it? Is it on the Gateway?
